review: first played 10 years ago it has held up quite well since it has flaws but just like an orange has to be peeled it is not what matters   fiction has this fascinating power of giving you characters and patterns that can easily reflect parts of who you are it respects both the reader and the characters making it perfect for some introspection   it opened my eyes and touched my heart i stopped running away from listening to myself and faced the coming day
